computedFields.name: KG
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('Converted_KG')>0 ||('Converted_KG')<0 then Converted_KG else ('QTY_INV_LITRES')*1.03  end
computedFields.label: KG

computedFields.name: PRODUCTNAME
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when len('PRODUCT_LINE_NAME')>=0 then upper('PRODUCT_LINE_NAME')  else "OTHERS" end
computedFields.label: PRODUCTNAME

computedFields.name: CUSTOMERS_NAME1
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when  starts_with('CUSTOMER_NAME', "A2")== true && 'CUSTOMER_NAME'!="A2 SAMPLES" then "Exclude" else 'CUSTOMER_NAME' end
computedFields.label: CUSTOMERS_NAME1

computedFields.name: STATE1
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when len('STATE')>=0 then upper('STATE') else "OTHERS" end
computedFields.label: STATE1

computedFields.name: CURRENCY1
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when len('CURRENCY')>=0 then upper('CURRENCY') else "OTHERS" end
computedFields.label: CURRENCY1

computedFields.name: PRODUCT_NAME
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when('PRODUCTNAME' == "A2 INFANT POWDER") then  "A2 INFANT FORMULA"  when('PRODUCTNAME' == "A2 INFANT FORMULA") then  "A2 INFANT FORMULA" when ('PRODUCTNAME' == "A2 WHOLE MILK POWDER") then "A2 MILK POWDER" when ('PRODUCTNAME' == "A2 CREAM - SG") then "A2 CREAM - SG" when ('PRODUCTNAME' == "A2 DAIRY MILK - FRESH" ) then "A2 DAIRY MILK - FRESH"  when ('PRODUCTNAME' == "A2 DAIRY MILK - UHT") then "A2 DAIRY MILK - UHT" when ('PRODUCTNAME' == "A2 ICE-CREAM") then "A2 ICE-CREAM" when ('PRODUCTNAME' == "A2 INFANT FORMULA") then"A2 INFANT FORMULA" when ('PRODUCTNAME' == "A2 MILK POWDER") then "A2 MILK POWDER" else "Other" end
computedFields.label: PRODUCT_NAME
